title: Data-independent Random Projections from the feature-space of the homogeneous polynomial kernel

tldr.text: This paper presents a novel method to perform Random Projections from the feature space of homogeneous polynomial kernels, focusing on a specific kernel family to preserve some of the beneficial properties of the original Random Projection algorithm.
